author: veithen
msg: XMLSCHEMA-3: Make sure that DefaultURIResolver properly resolves schema locations relative to JAR style URLs. This is important to be able to load schemas from the classpath.

msg: Speed up communication between MR AM and RM by relying on a new config rather than AM_EXPIRY_INTERVAL which is too large.
